titles.title: Margaret Thatcher Congressional Gold Medal Act
A bill to award a congressional gold medal to Margaret Thatcher, in recognition of her dedication to the values of free markets and free minds.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs.

committee.name: Senate Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs

term.name: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

bill.summary: 12/8/2006--Introduced. Margaret Thatcher Congressional Gold Medal Act - Provides for the presentation of a congressional gold medal to Margaret Thatcher in recognition of her dedication to the values of free markets and free minds.
